scripts.build:types: INSTA_UPDATE=always mise exec --env dev cargo:cargo-insta -- cargo-insta test --features codegen,numeric --test codegen
scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root hash-codec --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
